Name: Collapsible
Description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.

SubComponents.Name: Root
SubComponents.Description: Contains all the parts of a collapsible.

Props.Name: asChild
Props.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

Props.Name: defaultOpen
Props.Description: The open state of the collapsible when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

Props.Name: open
Props.Description: The controlled open state of the collapsible. Must be used in conjunction with onOpenChange.

Props.Name: onOpenChange
Props.Description: Event handler called when the open state of the collapsible changes.

Props.Name: disabled
Props.Description: Event handler called when the open state of the collapsible changes.

SubComponents.Name: Trigger
SubComponents.Description: The button that toggles the collapsible.

Props.Name: asChild
Props.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

SubComponents.Name: Content
SubComponents.Description: The component that contains the collapsible content.

Props.Name: asChild
Props.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

Props.Name: forceMount
Props.Description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with React animation libraries.
